page.title: 07BROWNHEATH & SAINTS FARM.
page.content:
In the {Brownheath}area there are mainly rough grazing fields for cattle and sheep.There are no specific amenities .The area contains only one house and three farms.Brownheath also has a large patch of public grassland known as Brownheath Common.
The area above Brownheath is the Saints farm area.This square consisted of mainly fields.Some are used for rough grazing,others for crops and a small amount were left with wild flowers and grasses growing in them.There is a very small area of woodland.The main features in this square are{Saints}farm and a small corner of{Oakley}.
